entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
